snippet: A gunman opened fire near the campus of Texas A&M University, killing two people including a local constable, before police shot him and took him into custody. He died shortly after.
abstract: A gunman opened fire near the campus of Texas A&M University, killing two people including a local constable, before police shot him and took him into custody. He died shortly after.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ, MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and J. DAVID GOODMAN

headline.main: Two Killed in Shooting Near Texas A&M Campus
